item.title: pip install Pygments
item.author: owainh@gmail.com (Owain Harris)
item.description: Tmux sessions If you spend any time in the command line and are not using Tmux, you're really missing out. Developers, DevOps and SysAdmins are always looking for tools to make their life more productive and easier to manage. Tmux is a favorite tool for many, for good reason. So.. what exactly is Tmux? The official term of Tmux is ' terminal multiplexer'. Tmux allows you to create saved sessions in your terminal, whether you're on your local machine or connected to a server via an SSH session.
